title: Was an Old Man Heckled and Forced to Dance by a Mob in Tamil Nadu?
subtitle: Tamil Nadu Old Man Viral Video Fact Check: A video which shows an old man dancing in full public view has gone viral on social media with a false claim that he was harassed by a mob in South India and forced to dance.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A video which shows an old man dancing in public has gone viral on social media with the claim that he was harassed by a mob in south India and forced to dance.

The viral claim further says that he is a Brahmin and his religious thread (Janaiyu) was forcibly removed.

The clip is ten seconds long and has been shared by multiple users on Facebook and Twitter.
